::Grounded::
REPARATION PROGRESS COMPLETE!
Grounded stood and walked to the door of the CR.
He looked out to Windlord. "I need a lab..." he said to the bot highly
doubing the answer to be yes. They don't even know him yet.
'I will probably have to go through a large Q&A' he mumbled to
himself, 'Then i can make a little change...or two!'
